scripts.docker-test: npm run docker-node -- -t node:8-alpine npm t -- -r spec
scripts.docker-test-dots: npm run docker-node -- node:8-alpine npm t -s -- -r dots
scripts.docker-test-coverage-server: npm run docker-node -- -p 8080:8080 -t node:8-alpine npm t -- -c html --web 8080
scripts.docs-build: rm ./docs -rf && documentation build -f html -g -o docs lib/**
scripts.docs-publish: npm run docs-build && rm -rf node_modules/gh-pages/.cache && gh-pages -d docs && rm ./docs -rf
scripts.docs-serve: documentation serve -t node_modules/documentation-theme-iam -f html -g -o docs --port 8080 --watch lib/**
scripts.git-reset: git reset --hard HEAD && git clean -df && git pull
